statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_monitoring;
SELECT facility_id, water_flow_rate FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY water_flow_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM water_usage_monitoring GROUP BY facility_id HAVING avg_pressure > 50;
SELECT facility_id, MAX(water_temperature) AS max_temp FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT facility_id) AS unique_facilities FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE water_flow_rate > 100 AND water_temperature < 20;
SELECT facility_id, timestamp, water_flow_rate, water_pressure, water_temperature FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC, water_pressure ASC
SELECT * FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE water_temperature > 20.00 ORDER BY water_flow_rate DESC
SELECT facility_id, AVG(water_pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM water_usage_monitoring GROUP BY facility_id HAVING avg_pressure > 50.00 ORDER BY facility_id
SELECT MAX(water_temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(water_temperature) AS min_temperature FROM water_usage_monitoring
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) AS num_records FROM water_usage_monitoring GROUP BY facility_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY facility_id ASC
SELECT * FROM production_facilities
SELECT facility_name, city, state FROM production_facilities
SELECT facility_id, city, state, water_usage FROM production_facilities ORDER BY facility_id DESC
SELECT * FROM water_usage_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT facility_name, water_consumption FROM production_facilities JOIN water_usage_logs ON production_facilities.facility_id = water_usage_logs.facility_id
SELECT * FROM production_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, city, state FROM production_facilities WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM production_facilities GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, log_date, water_consumption FROM production_facilities JOIN water_usage_logs ON production_facilities.facility_id = water_usage_logs.facility_id;
SELECT city, state, AVG(water_usage) AS average_water_usage FROM production_facilities GROUP BY city, state;
SELECT Facility_ID, Facility_Name, Location FROM Facilities WHERE Facility_ID = 1;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE Date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(Water_Consumed) AS Avg_Water_Consumed FROM Water_Usage WHERE Facility_ID = 2;
SELECT Facility_Name, Location, Production_Amount FROM Facilities f, Production_Schedule p WHERE f.Facility_ID = p.Facility_ID AND p.Production_Date = '2021-09-30';
SELECT Facility_ID, SUM(Water_Consumed) AS Total_Water_Consumed FROM Water_Usage GROUP BY Facility_ID HAVING Total_Water_Consumed > 1000;
SELECT Facility_Name, Location FROM Facilities
SELECT Facility_ID, Facility_Name, Location FROM Facilities ORDER BY Facility_ID ASC
SELECT Facility_ID, Facility_Name, Location FROM Facilities WHERE Location = 'New York'
SELECT Facility_ID, Facility_Name, SUM(Water_Consumed) AS Total_Water_Consumed FROM Water_Usage GROUP BY Facility_ID, Facility_Name
SELECT Facility_Name, Production_Date, Production_Amount FROM Facilities JOIN Production_Schedule ON Facilities.Facility_ID = Production_Schedule.Facility_ID ORDER BY Production_Date DESC
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM SustainabilityMetrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT facility_name, water_usage FROM Facilities WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Facilities WHERE water_usage > 100
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities WHERE facility_id = 3
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters WHERE meter_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY meter_reading DESC
SELECT facility_name, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM WaterMeters JOIN WaterConsumption ON WaterMeters.meter_id = WaterConsumption.meter_id GROUP BY facility_name

SELECT Facility.facility_name, COUNT(SustainabilityMetrics.metric_id) AS num_metrics FROM Facilities LEFT JOIN SustainabilityMetrics ON Facilities.facility_id = SustainabilityMetrics.facility_id GROUP BY Facilities.facility_name HAVING num_metrics > 0
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources WHERE water_capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, source_name, last_inspection_date FROM WaterSources WHERE last_inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM ProductionFacilities ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT metric_name, target_value FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE target_value >= 50;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT id, source_name, location FROM WaterSources WHERE water_capacity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, location, production_capacity FROM ProductionFacilities ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT source_name, location, last_inspection_date FROM WaterSources WHERE last_inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FacilityWaterUsage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
